channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaRon LLC -- Custom Query Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaRon LLC -- Custom Query Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-44059|2024-09-15T08:10:44.140Z -- mediaron%20llc -- custom%20query%20blocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MediaRon LLC Custom Query Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Custom Query Blocks: from n/a through 5.3.1.
